data.title: Hyperion Solutions Acquires EMI Porta
data.meta_description: On January 26, 2022, Hyperion Solutions acquired machinery company EMI Porta
data.text: Hyperion Solutions is an elevator component and solutions platform formed for suppliers to the largest elevator servicers and installers in the United States and Canada. Standard uses the latest technologies in automation, augmented reality, artificial intelligence, and composite materials in the applications of its solutions for both multi-national and independent elevator servicers. Hyperion Solutions is based in Memphis, Tennessee.
